lead_paragraph: An article on Friday about quarterback Todd Reesing’s academic and athletic success at Kansas omitted a passage at the continuation in some copies. It should have read, “It did not matter that as a junior, he was named the Texas 4A offensive player of the year over Matthew Stafford, who then was considered the No. 1 quarterback prospect in the nation and now leads No. 2 Georgia.” The article also misspelled the surname of a fellow quarterback in the Big 12 Conference. He is Missouri’s Chase Daniel, not Daniels. (The full article is at nytimes.com/sports.).
